abstract: The security unit manufactures surveillance cameras and alarms, and could fetch as much as $2 billion, three people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
snippet: The security unit manufactures surveillance cameras and alarms, and could fetch as much as $2 billion, three people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:54 p.m. DealBook has confirmed that General Electric has hired JPMorgan Chase to seek a buyer for its security unit, according to a person briefed on the proposed sale.
